channel.title: Richscape problem:how can i make people trade and drop items?
channel.description:
i don't know how to trade or make people drop items. Can anyone help me out here? If i dont answer tell me on aim aim: bigtbro821@aim.com msn: bigtbro821@hotmail.com
I really need help pm me if u can help if i dont answer back

item.title: Richscape problem:how can i make people trade and drop items?
item.dc:creator: @Picoscape Picoscape
item.description:
@Picoscape wrote:

I got the dropping part… can anyone help with the trading?

Dropping…

if (playerRights >= 4) {
sendMessage(“You can’t drop items.”);
return;
}
if ((playerItemsN[slot] != 0) && (droppedItem != -1)
&& (playerItems[slot] == droppedItem + 1)) {
for (int element : noTrade) {
if (droppedItem == element) {
sendMessage(“You can’t drop this item”);
return;
}
}
ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[slot] - 1, absX, absY,
playerItemsN[slot], playerId, false);
//createGroundItem(droppedItem, absX, absY, c);
deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);
updateRequired = true;
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Richscape problem:how can i make people trade and drop items?
